document.full_text: japanese officials grappling on sunday to end the world's worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl were focusing on a crack in a concrete pit that was leaking radiation into the ocean from a crippled reactor.
document.title: japan nuclear struggle focuses on cracked reactor pit
lines_and_colors: japanese officials grappling on sunday to end the world's worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl were focusing on a crack in a concrete pit that was leaking radiation into the ocean from a crippled reactor.
